p:
Isolation of primary clinical HIV-isolates HIV-1M MVP899-87, HIV-1O MVP5180-91, HIV-1 V13-03413B and HIV-2 MVP10668-93 is described in
43 . The HIV-1 M group/B-clade isolate (HIV-1 V13-03413B) was isolated from a patient with virological treatment failure
8 . Clinical isolates were produced from HIV infected H9 cells as described
8 .
